content: Multitool universal plunge cut blade BiM plunge cutting blade for the oscillating multitool, for plunge cuts in nail embedded wood, plastics, and metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out plunge cut blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications BiM blade for plunge cuts and cut-outs in nail embedded wood, plastic, and metal Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2368506 - Plunge cut blade SMT S+65 BiM wood/steel - Package Size 1 pc - 2368505 - Plunge cut blade SMT S+ BiM wood/steel - Package Size 1 pc - 2368504 - Plunge cut blade SMT SM BiM wood/steel - Package Size 1 pc - 3867278 - Plunge Cut Blade Universal (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Plunge cut blade SMT S+ BiM wood/steel
